text: @WhiteHouse @VP @realDonaldTrump @Mike_Pence IDIOT! There is NO POSITIVE aspect to the COVID-19 virus. 149 cases and 11 dead, that's not positive in any way shape or form, FIX IT @realDonaldTrump
